page.title: 13Deborah Allen's School Day
page.content: Wednesday 7.30 Get up, eat breakfast, and dress 8.00 Wash and get ready for school. 8.20 Catch school bus. 8.35 Arrive at Newbridge High School. 8.45 Register marked, notices given out. 8.55 Science:'Insight' course. 10.05 French - in Mobile classroom. 11.15 Go to Canteen for Break. 11.35 Design - this week we are finishing off our Woodwork. 12.45 Lunchtime at last! I eat my sandwiches in the Canteen as it is raining. (On nice days I eat them in the Bike Sheds). 1.45 Afternoon registration, and our weekly 1st Form Assembly, held in the Gym since the hall was burnt down. 2.10 Back to Design Centre for Design 3.20 Leave to catch bus home.
